full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 2RS WINDIAN OV 1 GI TOUR NOTARIAL NOTARIAL GRIA WORUPEES TWO RUPEES DELH AFFIDAVIT STATE ( Natary Pablic ## I, Maj. Dhyan Singh uppal son of Shri Bheja Singh Uppal DELHI. resident of A-3/15 ,Janakpuri ,New Delhi_ 110058 de hereby solemnly affirm and declare as under : 1. That My son Shri Joginder Singh uppal was born on dt. 30th June 1942( 30th day of June nineteen hundred forty two ) 2. That my statement is true and correct Dhian . Singh Uppal major Retired Deponent. Verification : verified at New Delhi on this 10th day of June 1993 that the contents of the above said affidavit are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief and nothing has been concealed therefrom . Dhiay Singhappal major Reford Deponent. Notary Paulte BINGU } X r ATTESTED #. ATTESTED DELHI, Motory Public, Delhi 10-6-93
